title: Apple custard tart
ingredients: ['For the apple filling', '60g butter', '2 tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '100g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'For the custard', '60g butter, softened', '75g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '180ml buttermilk', '1 (23cm) shortcrust pastry case']
